title:
NVIDIA RTX 4060/4070 Dominate Bestselling Charts as AMD’s RX 7800 XT Holds 
Firm [Feb 2024]
text: NVIDIA’s RTX 4060 and 4070 are the most popular gaming graphics cards of February 2024. The launch of the RTX 4070 Super and the accompanying price cuts to existing Radeon and GeForce cards haven’t significantly altered GPU bestselling charts. The last-gen RTX 3060 (12GB) and the RTX 4060 (8GB) are the top-selling cards at Newegg, Amazon, and BestBuy, followed by the RTX 4070 (12GB). Meanwhile, the GeForce RTX 4070 Super (12GB) comes fourth at most US retailers. At Germany’s largest retailer (Mindfactory), the Radeon RX 7800 XT was the #1 bestseller for the nth continuous month. The RX 7900 XT came in second, followed by the RTX 4060 Ti and the RTX 4070 Ti Super. The GeForce RTX 4070 Super ranks fifth, ahead of the RX 7900 XTX and the RTX 4080 Super. (Via: TechEpiphany) At B&H, the Radeon RX 7800 XT leads the bestsellers, followed by the RTX 4060, RTX 4070 Super, and the RTX 4080 Super. Interestingly, four of the top eight spots are held by different variants of the RTX 4070/4070 Super. At Digitech (Switzerland), the GeForce RTX 4070 is the top seller, followed by the RTX 3060 and the RTX 4090. The Radeon RX 7900 XTX comes in seventh, right behind the RTX 4060 but ahead of the RTX 4060 Ti.
